mdRecord.dcterms:title: President Ronald Reagan Speaking at Mount Vernon
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: White House (Washington, D.C.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: U. S. President Ronald Reagan and First Lady Nancy Reagan visit Mount Vernon on February 22, 1982 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of George Washington's birth. President Reagan addresses special guests from a podium on the steps of the west front of the Mansion. Mrs. Guy, Regent of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association, and Revolutionary War reenactors stand nearby.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Anniversaries, etc.
